title: Tomato Soup
description: Makes 6 servings of creamy tomato soup. Takes about 30 minutes to make.
directions: Melt butter and extra-virgin olive oil in a large saucepan.
Stir in thinly sliced onion and crushed garlic.
Cook over moderate heat for about 5 minutes.
Add tomatos, water, heavy cream, crushed red pepper, celery seed, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Break up the tomatos with the back of the spoon.
Puree the tomato soup in a blender, then rewarm the soup if necessary.
